hero.headline: The marketplace that sells for you
hero.subhead: Thrifts uses AI to optimize listings, bundle items, and match buyers and sellers in real-time. Native to M-Pesa and built for fashion & everyday goods.

aiIntro.heading: AI Agents that work for you
aiIntro.subtext: Smart pricing, automated listings, and AI-powered discovery help you focus on growth while our tools optimize sales.

howItWorksMerchants.title: Create your shop
howItWorksMerchants.desc: Upload inventory or list items from your phone. Our AI drafts titles, tags, and great photos.

howItWorksMerchants.title: Let AI optimize
howItWorksMerchants.desc: We test prices, bundle items, and promote the right listings to the right buyers.

howItWorksMerchants.title: Get paid your way
howItWorksMerchants.desc: Seamless checkout with M-Pesa and cards. Escrow and delivery tracking keep everyone safe.
